programme is for graduates in English and related subjects
who wish to teach in secondary schools. English is a compulsory
subject for all pupils up to the age of 16 and the National
Literacy Strategy gives high priority to the development
of pupils' knowledge of grammar, punctuation and accuracy
We are a well-established provider of English teachers
with strong links with schools in Yorkshire and across the
North East. The employment rate of our students is very
high and our graduates have taken up teaching posts across
the UK as well as within our partnership schools.
The programme runs for 37 weeks from September to July.
At least 24 weeks of training is school-based. There are
the foundation of knowledge and understanding necessary

STAGE 2 is school-based (school A) and seeks to provide
the basic skills necessary for you to function as a teacher.
